mapper.sql: a.id AS id, a.name AS name, a.enname AS enname, a.role_type AS roleType, a.data_scope AS dataScope, a.create_by AS createBy, a.create_date AS createDate, a.update_by AS updateBy, a.update_date AS updateDate, a.remarks AS remarks, a.del_flag AS delFlag
LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = a.office_id
mapper.select: SELECT , rm.menu_id AS "menuList.id", FROM sys_role a LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.role_id = a.id WHERE a.id = #{roleId}

SELECT
FROM sys_role a LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = a.id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND u.id = #{id} group by a.id
